,RawBlock "latex" "\n\\begin{code}\ntype FilePath = String\n\n-- \1095\1090\1077\1085\1080\1077 \1092\1072\1081\1083\1072\nreadFile    :: FilePath -> IO String\n\n-- \1079\1072\1087\1080\1089\1100 \1089\1090\1088\1086\1082\1080 \1074 \1092\1072\1081\1083\nwriteFile   :: FilePath -> String -> IO ()\n\n-- \1076\1086\1073\1072\1074\1083\1077\1085\1080\1077 \1089\1090\1088\1086\1082\1080 \1074 \1082\1086\1085\1077\1094\1080 \1092\1072\1081\1083\1072\nappendFile  :: FilePath -> String -> IO ()\n\\end{code}\n"

,RawBlock "latex" "\n\\begin{code}\nmain = msg1 >> getLine >>= read >>= append\n    where read   file = readFile file >>= putStrLn >> return file\n          append file = msg2 >> getLine >>= appendFile file\n          msg1        = putStr \"input file: \"\n          msg2        = putStr \"input text: \"\n\\end{code}\n"

,RawBlock "latex" "\n\\begin{code}\nmodule Main where\n\nimport Control.Applicative\nimport System.Environment\n\nmain = putStrLn =<< reply <$> getProgName <*> getArgs\n\nreply :: String -> [String] -> String\nreply name (x:_) = hi name ++ case x of\n    \"happy\"     -> \"What a lovely day. What's up?\"\n    \"sad\"       -> \"Ooohh. Have you got some news for me?\"\n    \"neutral\"   -> \"How are you?\"  \nreply name _     = reply name [\"neutral\"]\n\n\nhi :: String -> String\nhi name = \"Hi! My name is \" ++ name ++ \".\\n\"\n\\end{code}\n"

,Para [Str "\1054\1096\1080\1073\1082\1080",Space,Str "\1092\1091\1085\1082\1094\1080\1081",Space,Str "\1089",Space,Str "\1087\1086\1073\1086\1095\1085\1099\1084\1080",Space,Str "\1101\1092\1092\1077\1082\1090\1072\1084\1080",Space,Str "\1086\1073\1088\1072\1073\1072\1090\1099\1074\1072\1102\1090\1089\1103",Space,Str "\1089",Space,Str "\1087\1086\1084\1086\1097\1100\1102",Space,Str "\1089\1087\1077\1094\1080\1072\1083\1100\1085\1086\1081",Space,Str "\1092\1091\1085\1082\1094\1080\1080",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{catch}",Str ",",Space,Str "\1086\1085\1072",Space,Str "\1086\1087\1088\1077\1076\1077\1083\1077\1085\1072",Space,Str "\1074",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{Prelude}",Str ":"]

,RawBlock "latex" "\n\\begin{code}\nmain = try `catch` handler\n\nhandler :: IOError -> IO ()\nhandler = ( >> main) . putStrLn . msg2 . msg1\n\nmsg1 e \n    | isDoesNotExistErrorType e = \"File does not exist. \"\n    | isPermissionErrorType e   = \"Access denied. \"\n    | otherwise                 = \"\"\n\nmsg2 = (++ \"Try again.\")\n\\end{code}\n"

"\1082\1083\1072\1089\1089\1072",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{Monad}",Space,Str "\1076\1083\1103",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{StateT}"]
,RawBlock "latex" "\n\\begin{code}\ninstance (Monad m) => Monad (StateT s m) where\n    return a = StateT $ \\s -> return (s, a)\n    \n    a >>= f = StateT $ \\s0 ->\n        runStateT a s0 >>= \\(b, s1) -> runStateT (f b) s1            \n\\end{code}\n"
,Para [Str "\1042",Space,Str "\1101\1090\1086\1084",Space,Str "\1086\1087\1088\1077\1076\1077\1083\1077\1085\1080\1080",Space,Str "\1084\1099",Space,Str "\1087\1088\1086\1087\1091\1089\1082\1072\1077\1084",Space,Str "\1089\1086\1089\1090\1086\1103\1085\1080\1077",Space,Str "\1095\1077\1088\1077\1079",Space,Str "\1089\1080\1090\1086",Space,Str "\1084\1077\1090\1086\1076\1086\1074",Space,Str "\1082\1083\1072\1089\1089\1072",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{Monad}",Space,Str "\1076\1083\1103",Space,Str "\1090\1080\1087\1072",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{m}",Str ".",Space,Str "\1042",Space,Str "\1086\1089\1090\1072\1083\1100\1085\1086\1084",Space,Str "\1101\1090\1086",Space,Str "\1086\1087\1088\1077\1076\1077\1083\1077\1085\1080\1077",Space,Str "\1085\1080\1095\1077\1084",Space,Str "\1085\1077",Space,Str "\1086\1090\1083\1080\1095\1072\1077\1090\1089\1103",Space,Str "\1086\1090",Space,Str "\1085\1072\1096\1077\1075\1086",Str ".",Space,Str "\1058\1072\1082\1078\1077",Space,Str "\1086\1087\1088\1077\1076\1077\1083\1077\1085\1099",Space,Str "\1080",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{ReaderT}",Str ",",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{WriterT}",Str ",",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{ListT}",Space,Str "\1080",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{MaybeT}",Str ".",Space,Str "\1050\1083\1102\1095\1077\1074\1099\1084",Space,Str "\1082\1083\1072\1089\1089\1086\1084",Space,Str "\1076\1083\1103",Space,Str "\1074\1089\1077\1093",Space,Str "\1101\1090\1080\1093",Space,Str "\1090\1080\1087\1086\1074",Space,Str "\1103\1074\1083\1103\1077\1090\1089\1103",Space,Str "\1082\1083\1072\1089\1089",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{MonadTrans}",Str ":"]

,RawBlock "latex" "\n\\begin{code}\nmodule FSMt where\n\nimport Control.Monad.Trans.Class\nimport Control.Monad.Trans.State\nimport Control.Monad.Trans.Writer\n\nimport Data.Monoid\n\ntype FSM s = StateT s (Writer [String]) s\n\nfsm :: Show ev => (ev -> s -> s) -> (ev -> FSM s)\nfsm transition e = log e >> run e\n    where run e = StateT $ \\s -> return (s, transition e s)  \n          log e = lift $ tell [show e] \n\\end{code}\n"

  ,RawBlock "latex" "\n\\begin{code}\n-- \1088\1072\1079\1073\1080\1077\1085\1080\1077 \1089\1090\1088\1086\1082\1080 \1085\1072 \1087\1086\1076\1089\1090\1088\1086\1082\1080 \1087\1086 \1087\1077\1088\1077\1085\1086\1089\1072\1084 \1082\1072\1088\1077\1090\1082\1080\nlines :: String -> [String]\n\n-- \1088\1072\1079\1073\1080\1077\1085\1080\1077 \1089\1090\1088\1086\1082\1080 \1085\1072 \1087\1086\1076\1089\1090\1088\1086\1082\1080 \1087\1086 \1087\1088\1086\1073\1077\1083\1072\1084\nwords :: String -> [String]\n\n-- \1074\1086\1079\1074\1088\1072\1097\1072\1077\1090 True \1090\1086\1083\1100\1082\1086 \1074 \1090\1086\1084 \1089\1083\1091\1095\1072\1077, \1077\1089\1083\1080 \n-- \1087\1077\1088\1074\1099\1081 \1089\1087\1080\1089\1086\1082 \1087\1086\1083\1085\1086\1089\1090\1100\1102 \1089\1086\1076\1077\1088\1078\1080\1090\1089\1103 \1074\1086 \1074\1090\1086\1088\1086\1084\nisInfixOf :: Eq a => [a] -> [a] -> Bool\n\\end{code}\n"]
 ,[Para [Str "\1050\1083\1072\1089\1089\1099",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{Functor}",Space,Str "\1080",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{Applicative}",Space,Str "\1079\1072\1084\1082\1085\1091\1090\1099",Space,Str "\1086\1090\1085\1086\1089\1080\1090\1077\1083\1100\1085\1086",Space,Str "\1082\1086\1084\1087\1086\1079\1080\1094\1080\1080",Str ".",Space,Str "\1069\1090\1086",Space,Str "\1089\1074\1086\1081\1089\1090\1074\1086",Space,Str "\1075\1086\1074\1086\1088\1080\1090",Space,Str "\1086",Space,Str "\1090\1086\1084",Str ",",Space,Str "\1095\1090\1086",Space,Str "\1082\1086\1084\1087\1086\1079\1080\1094\1080\1103",Space,Str "(",Str "\1072\1087\1087\1083\1080\1082\1072\1090\1080\1074\1085\1099\1093",Str ")",Space,Str "\1092\1091\1085\1082\1090\1086\1088\1086\1074",Space,Str "\1089\1085\1086\1074\1072",Space,Str "\1103\1074\1083\1103\1077\1090\1089\1103",Space,Str "(",Str "\1072\1087\1087\1083\1080\1082\1072\1090\1080\1074\1085\1099\1084",Str ")",Space,Str "\1092\1091\1085\1082\1090\1086\1088\1086\1084",Str ".",Space,Str "\1044\1086\1082\1072\1078\1080\1090\1077",Space,Str "\1101\1090\1086",Str "!",Space,Str "\1055\1091\1089\1090\1100",Space,Str "\1076\1072\1085",Space,Str "\1090\1080\1087",Str ",",Space,Str "\1082\1086\1090\1086\1088\1099\1081",Space,Str "\1086\1087\1080\1089\1099\1074\1072\1077\1090",Space,Str "\1082\1086\1084\1087\1086\1079\1080\1094\1080\1102",Space,Str "\1076\1074\1091\1093",Space,Str "\1090\1080\1087\1086\1074",Str ":"]
  ,RawBlock "latex" "\n\\begin{code}\nnewtype O f g a = O { unO :: f (g a) }\n\\end{code}\n"
  ,Para [Str "\1054\1087\1088\1077\1076\1077\1083\1080\1090\1077",Space,Str "\1101\1082\1079\1077\1084\1087\1083\1103\1088\1099",Space,Str "\1082\1083\1072\1089\1089\1086\1074",Str ":"]

  ,Para [Str "\1055\1086\1076\1089\1082\1072\1079\1082\1072",Str ":",Space,Str "\1077\1089\1083\1080",Space,Str "\1089\1086\1074\1089\1077\1084",Space,Str "\1085\1077",Space,Str "\1087\1086\1083\1091\1095\1072\1077\1090\1089\1103",Str ",",Space,Str "\1086\1090\1074\1077\1090",Space,Str "\1084\1086\1078\1085\1086",Space,Str "\1087\1086\1076\1089\1084\1086\1090\1088\1077\1090\1100",Space,Str "\1074",Space,Str "\1073\1080\1073\1083\1080\1086\1090\1077\1082\1077",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{TypeCompose}",Str ".",Space,Str "\1053\1086",Space,Str "\1087\1086\1082\1072",Space,Str "\1084\1099",Space,Str "\1085\1077",Space,Str "\1079\1085\1072\1077\1084",Space,Str "\1082\1072\1082",Space,Str "\1091\1089\1090\1072\1085\1072\1074\1083\1080\1074\1072\1090\1100",Space,Str "\1073\1080\1073\1083\1080\1086\1090\1077\1082\1080",Space,Str "\1080",Space,Str "\1075\1076\1077",Space,Str "\1086\1085\1080",Space,Str "\1078\1080\1074\1091\1090",Str ",",Space,Str "\1074\1089\1105",Str "-",Str "\1090\1072\1082\1080",Space,Str "\1087\1086\1087\1099\1090\1072\1081\1090\1077\1089\1100",Space,Str "\1088\1077\1096\1080\1090\1100",Space,Str "\1101\1090\1086",Space,Str "\1091\1087\1088\1072\1078\1085\1077\1085\1080\1077",Space,Str "\1089\1072\1084\1086\1089\1090\1086\1103\1090\1077\1083\1100\1085\1086",Str "."]]]]
